channel.title: [562] Huge Shop Glitch - Important! [562]
channel.description: Need help with this shop glitch. ok heres what goes down. When somebody has a full inventory of items and 1 spot of cash, They can buy anything from anystore for free. I do not know why this is happening. Please help me I do not know what to do.

Need help with this shop glitch.
ok heres what goes down. When somebody has a full inventory of items and 1 spot of cash, They can buy anything from anystore for free. I do not know why this is happening. Please help me I do not know what to do.
